dt: {bc}to cover by or as if by scattering something
{bc}to become dispersed over as if scattered

et: Middle English {it}strewen, strowen{/it}, from Old English {it}strewian, strēowian{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}strewen{/it} to strew, Latin {it}struere{/it} to heap up, {it}sternere{/it} to spread out, Greek {it}stornynai{/it}
shortdef: to cover by or as if by scattering something
to become dispersed over as if scattered
